div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 16:35 pm CDT

div.div: A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. South wind 10 to 14 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 79. South wind 5 to 8 mph becoming calm.
A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4am. Increasing clouds, with a low around 57. Light and variable wind becoming south 5 to 8 mph in the evening.

strong.span: All students are able to access their teacher or teachers through the portal below.
If you have questions or concerns, please contact:
Mr. Biltoft - sbiltoft@ebutler.esu7.org or Mr. Eldridge - meldridge@ebutler.esu7.org.

span.b: Please click on the links below for information on each of the platforms that classroom teachers may be using, as well as access to the E-Learning Portal.

div.script: ;(function($) {/* Add the "active" class to the first item in the carousel */$('#socs-feature-carousel .item:first, #socs-feature-carousel .carousel-indicators > li:first').addClass('active'); })(jQuery);

div.p:
Purpose Statement: East Butler Public Schools, in cooperation with the communities we serve, will inspire students to become responsible, creative, and innovative citizens in the ever-changing world.
Vision Statements:
*Create a safe and respectful environment for students and staff members.
*Expect and provide for high levels of commitment, collaboration, and communication among students, staff and community members.
*Provide and maintain an effective curriculum that aligns with recognized standards and is systematically monitored.
*Empower students with innovative technology and strategies to succeed in a global society.
*Value diversity in ways that enrich student learning.
